Also how true is the inbreeding leads to mutants thing?
topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f6434f6368724145890000#post_54f6434f6368724145890000
Mutants generally untrue, massively inferior specimens of our species on the other hand, if 2 people share too much of the same DNA bad traits that normally get suppressed by others DNA starts to show up more, weaker imune systems disabilities way increased chances for inherited things like Diabetes and addictions.
topics.author: 509f70a87f123b77eb0004fd

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f6434f6368724145890000#post_54f6434f6368724145890000
[bq="mariomarc"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f642926368720906ef0300#post_54f642926368720906ef0300
Also how true is the inbreeding leads to mutants thing?[/bq]
No

Long explanation:
Only parent-child offspring have a chance of family genetic diseases having a higher chance.  If someone here is in a sexual relationship with their parent/child and having a offspring I would *HIGHLY* have to suggest the fetus getting tested before they're born.  Basically if say you have a 50% chance of getting heart disease stack another 25% chance on top of that; 50% * 1.25 = 62.5% chance.  If your family has a severe genetic disease I would *HIGHLY FUCKING HAVE TO SUGGEST* them getting the fetus tested.  If it's any other form of relationship the chance is insignificant.


"*RULES OF MENTOS!*":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1C_Qh7NGwho

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f645576368723c0c240000#post_54f645576368723c0c240000
[bq="mariomarc"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f644b86368727f6a9f0400#post_54f644b86368727f6a9f0400
So if Albus and Ivy have a kid, it would probably be fine[/bq]
If there was something wrong with the kid it would be because one of them had a genetic disease anyhow and not cause of their relationship.

What I mean by this is that let's say Albus has diabetes; the child would develop diabetes *because* Albus had diabetes and not cause of their relationship and that even if he wasn't with her chances are his kid would have diabetus anyhow.

To put it simply: the people that think incest causes "mutants" are fucking idiots.
